alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 5:59PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF UPPER TREASURE VALLEY COUNTY... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 558 PM MST, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from near Initial Point to near Oreana and moving east at 15 MPH. THIS LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL BE NEAR... Kuna around 600 PM MST. Big Foot Butte around 630 PM MST. Grand View, Blacks Creek Reservoir, Boise Stage Stop and C J Strike Dam around 640 PM MST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
